    <facet>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>
            <entry>112491</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Clothes 2</string>
            <string language="en">Clothes 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kleidet 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vêtx 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Veste 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Copre 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενδύματα 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arropa 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">In this drag’n’drop exercise you practise the clothes words you learned in Clothes 1.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
            <string language="en">In this exercise you drag'n'drop practice the clothes words you learned in Clothes 1. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">clothes</string>
            <string language="sv">word knowledge</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">clothes</string>
            <string language="en">word knowledge</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Übung üben Sie drag'n'drop die 
Kleidungwörter, die Sie in Kleidung 1 erlernten. Safir - 
Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 2 - wieviel ist es?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cet exercice vous drag'n'drop pratiquez les 
mots de vêtements que vous avez appris dans des vêtements 1. 
Safir - l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - module 2 -
combien coûte-t-il ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Neste exercício você drag'n'drop pratica as 
palavras que da roupa você aprendeu na roupa 1. Safir - vida do
inglês e de funcionamento para novatos - módulo 2 - quanto é ele?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa esercitazione drag'n'drop vi esercitate
nelle parole che dei vestiti avete imparato in vestiti 1. Safir 
- inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - modulo 2 - quanto è 
esso?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την άσκηση drag'n'drop πρακτική οι λέξεις 
ενδυμάτων εσείς μάθατε στα ενδύματα 1. Safir - αγγλική και 
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 2 - πόσο 
είναι αυτό;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En este ejercicio usted drag'n'drop practica las 
palabras de las ropas que usted aprendió en las ropas 1. ¿Safir
- inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo 2 - cuánto 
es él?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Saphir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
